scripts.deploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn codegen && yarn generate mainnet && yarn deploy pixowl/the-sandbox
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn codegen && yarn generate rinkeby && yarn deploy pixowl/the-sandbox-rinkeby
